assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study was conducted in accordance with the Declaration of Helsinki. Ethics approval was granted by the Conjoint Health Research Ethics Board (CHREB# REB14-0340_REN4) at the University of Calgary. Informed consent informed was obtained from all subjects. Consent for the publication of facial images was obtained for the example subject shown in Figs. InternalRef removed and InternalRef removed.
